message.subject: Meet
message.content:
M1.1. I agree that we need to get together.
[Inform: Jacqueline agrees that she and recipients need to get together]
M1.2. I am going to grind out a spreadsheet
tomorrow night.
[Inform: Jacqueline will produce a spreadsheet tomorrow]
M1.3. Unfortunately, my friends birthday dinner is Thursday
night.
[Inform: Jacqueline's friend's birthday dinner is Thursday night] Blink2.1
M1.4. I know Ted is going to be gone for the weekend.
[Inform: Jacqueline knows Ted is gone for the weekend]
Sflink1.4
M1.5. Can we get together tomorrow or over the weekend without Ted?
[Request-Information: can Jacqueline and recipients meet during the weekend without Ted]
Flink1.5
M1.6. Ted is going
to do some research on the discount rate, which can be dropped in to any
analysis that we come up with.
[Inform: Ted will do research on discount rate, which can be added to analysis Jacqueline and recipients will put forth]
M1.7. What do you think?
[Request-Information: recipients' thoughts]
Flink1.7

message.subject: Meet
message.content:
M2.1. Hey, I know it's a pain, but I think there would be value in getting together
(if folks are available) on Thursday evening from 7-10 with (lots of) beer
and pizza and grind through the finance case.
[Inform: Jeff thinks it would be a good idea to meet on Thursday evening to go through finance case and eat and drink] Sflink2.1
M2.2. We can do it at my apartment,
or anywhere else you folks would like to do it.
[Inform: location can be Jeff's apartment or elsewhere]
M2.3. Thoughts?
[Request-Information: recipients' thoughts]
Flink2.3

message.subject: Meet
message.content:
M3.1. as far as i'm concerned ted' off the team, period. (we kid!)
[Inform: joke that Ted should be kicked off of this project]
Blink1.4
M3.2. Tomorrow's fine with me.
[Inform: tomorrow is ok with Jeff]
Blink1.5

message.subject: Meet
message.content:
M4.1. Hey: we meeting tonite?
[Request-Information: are Jeff and recipients meeting tonight]
Blink1.5
Flink4.1
M4.2. can you BELIEVE this bloody election?
[Request-Information: recipients' opinions on presidential election]
Flink4.2
